unnormalised: What are the important dates for festivals in India?
normalised: What are the important dates for festivals in India?

unnormalised: Well, India is a land of festivals, celebrated throughout the year! It's honestly hard to keep track of them all sometimes. For example, this year Diwali is on 01/11/2024, but the date changes every year depending on the lunar calendar. Navratri usually falls around September/October, but again, check the specific dates each yr.

unnormalised: Then you have Holi, the festival of colors, which is usually around March. Ganesh Chaturthi, mainly celebrated in Maharashtra, falls around August/September. Don't forget Eid, which also follows the lunar calendar, so its dates shift every year. And Christmas, of course, is always on 25/12 every year.
